webpage.title: Habitat for Humanity London
webpage.article:
Committees We rely on a number of committees to keep things moving here at Habitat for Humanity London. If you would like to volunteer, look for committee openings below.
Fund-Raising Committee
Family Selection Committee
Our Family Selection Committee is in need of a Secretary. Please see the application form (DOC).
Volunteer Committee
Building Committee
Finance Committee
ReStore Committee
We currently have an opening on our ReStore Committee. We're looking for someone who
is organized and reliable,
can be creative in helping our retail growth.
If you would like to attend an information session on this committee, please contact our volunteer coordinator.
Public Relations/Marketing Committee
Faith Relations Committee
We currently have an opening on our Faith Relations Committee. We're looking for someone who
is organized and reliable,
is a good public speaker.
If you would like to attend an information session on this committee, please contact our volunteer coordinator.
Land Acquisition Committee
Board of Directors
